Level Six
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Six
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, July 14, 2001 - 07:18 pm:

STAGE 6

At the start of the stage,you will be standing on the wooden boxes. Create a wooden box,right of you,and jump on it. Now,face left,and create a box,and stand on it. Now,do it again. Now create boxes underneath/left on you,and you are near to the Jell. Destroy the wooden box and the Jell will fall to it's death. Move all the way left,and below you will be standing on the wooden box,under the wooden box,will be the golden key. BUT DON'T GET THE GOLDEN KEY YET,UNLESS YOU WANT TO CATCH HARE. If you don't want to catch hare,I'll just leave you here,of course, you can't win the rest of this stage on your own. If you wnat to catch hare,follow me now. Create a box next to the Dino,and once the dino get on the box,destroy it,and the dino will fall to it's death. To make sure where you stand,you would be standing on the box,which below the box is the golden key. Face right,and create a box,and jump on it. Jump up the metal block twice. Once you are there,Crouch down,and while crouching down,press the A button to create a box,and still crouching down,destroy the box which yiou have just created,and there is the "monster flame" which brings you to the bonus stage to let you catch hare.(NOTE: YOU NEED A COMPLETE DISC TO CATCH MONSTER. JUST TOUCH THEM WHEN YOU HAVE ALL THE COMPLETE DISC.) Go back to the box where is the golden key below on,and destroy that box,than jump down and take the golden key,and move right,destroying all the wooden boxes,DON'T GO INTO THE DOOR YET,UNLESS YOU WANT TO CATCH HARE. Stack and climb up those boxes and get the monster flame,than go into the door,GOOD LUCK TO THOSE WHO ARE TRYING TO CATCH HARE,AND HERE YOU WIN STAGE 6.
